problem_text: The orthocenter of \triangle A B C is located 6.4 units from point D. Find B C.
compact_text: The orthocenter of \triangle ABC is located 6.4 units from point D. Find BC.
annotat_text: Refer to the figure at the right. The orthocenter of $\triangle A B C$ is located 6.4 units from point $D$. Find $B C$.
